channel.title: Gray desktop color on Gateway 16. Ok?
channel.description: Hi. I set up Whonix Gateway 16.0.3.1 XFCE and I saw gray screen as background image. No mouse at the center of the screen with blue background color as in previous version. Is it okay or something went wrong? shasums are ok.

item.title: Gray desktop color on Gateway 16. Ok?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Gray desktop color on Gateway 16. Ok?
